description.en:
A treasure of 14 charming stories about family, friends, couples and unexpected bonds. Written by Natsume Ono over ten years, here is the long-awaited collection of her early work, including numerous illustrations and previously unpublished stories! (Viz Signature)

Contents:
Una giornata fredda
Ometura (Inside Out)
Moyashi Fuufu (Sprouts Couple)
Three Short Stories About Bento
Eva's Memory
Froom Family
Christmas Morning
Padre
Senza titolo #1-6
Galleria di illustrazione

Many of these short stories were first published as dōjinshi or on Ono's website, and IKKI Comix has collected them together here along with a few stand-alone pieces published in its own magazine.

[u][b]Polish / Polski:[/b][/u] 
Moyashi Fuufu:
Wzruszający one-shot o parze "starych pierników".
